benchmark_details.name: SD-Eval (Spoken Dialogue Evaluation)
benchmark_details.overview: SD-Eval is a benchmark dataset aimed at the multidimensional evaluation of spoken dialogue understanding and generation, focusing on paralinguistic and environmental information.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To advance the development of more empathetic and intelligent spoken dialogue systems that can generate appropriate responses based on paralinguistic and environmental information.

data.source: Aggregated from eight public datasets focused on speech interaction with emotional and contextual variations.
data.annotation: Generated responses based on paralinguistic and environmental information

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on automated evaluations and comparisons with human judgment.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with human understandings of responses in context.
methodology.validation: Evaluation through subjective and objective measures
